description: Sprint took 4 hours instead of estimated 1.5 hours
sprintResults:
## Sprint 6 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Duration | Estimated |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #50 | Add file upload API | 3 | ✅ Done | #51 | 52m | 15m |
| #52 | Add image resize | 2 | ✅ Done | #53 | 38m | 12m |
| #54 | Add file validation | 2 | ✅ Done | #55 | 41m | 10m |
| #56 | Add storage service | 3 | ✅ Done | #57 | 55m | 18m |
| #58 | Add CDN integration | 2 | ✅ Done | #59 | 35m | 12m |
| #60 | Fix file deletion | 1 | ✅ Done | #61 | 19m | 8m |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 4h 00m (estimated 1h 15m) — 3.2x over estimate
**Quality Gate**: All passed but required 2-3 attempts each
**Total QG Attempts**: 16 (expected 6)
**Bottleneck**: Quality gate retries consumed 2h 15m
**CI Queue Time**: Average 8 minutes per run (expected 2 minutes)

description: Quality gate retries used up all 5 attempts on 3 issues
sprintResults:
## Sprint 8 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | QG Attempts | Final Result |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #70 | Add caching layer | 3 | ❌ Failed | #71 | 5/5 | Failed — flaky test |
| #72 | Fix memory leak | 2 | ✅ Done | #73 | 4/5 | Passed on retry 4 |
| #74 | Add connection pool | 3 | ❌ Failed | #75 | 5/5 | Failed — timeout |
| #76 | Update query optimizer | 2 | ✅ Done | #77 | 3/5 | Passed on retry 3 |
| #78 | Add index manager | 2 | ❌ Failed | #79 | 5/5 | Failed — flaky test |
| #80 | Fix deadlock | 1 | ✅ Done | #81 | 1/5 | Passed first try |

**Velocity**: 5/13 points completed
**Duration**: 3h 15m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: 23/30 total attempts used (77%)
**Flaky Tests**: 2 issues failed due to flaky timing-dependent tests
**Timeout Issues**: 1 issue failed because QG check exceeded 180s limit
**Wasted CI Time**: ~1h 45m on retries that didn't fix underlying issues
previousImprovements: Sprint 7 retro: Improved code review prompt

description: One issue consumed 60% of total sprint time
sprintResults:
## Sprint 10 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Duration | % of Sprint |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #90 | Implement OAuth2 PKCE | 5 | ✅ Done | #91 | 1h 48m | 60% |
| #92 | Add token refresh | 2 | ✅ Done | #93 | 18m | 10% |
| #94 | Fix CORS headers | 1 | ✅ Done | #95 | 12m | 7% |
| #96 | Update auth docs | 1 | ✅ Done | #97 | 8m | 4% |
| #98 | Add session cleanup | 2 | ✅ Done | #99 | 22m | 12% |
| #100 | Fix redirect URI | 2 | ✅ Done | #101 | 12m | 7% |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 3h 00m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Bottleneck**: Issue #90 took 1h 48m — 60% of sprint time
**#90 Breakdown**: 5 QG attempts (3 test failures, 1 lint, 1 review rejection)
**Other Issues**: Average 14m each — within normal range
**Impact**: Sprint delivery delayed by 1.5 hours due to single issue
previousImprovements: Sprint 9 retro: Enabled parallel worker execution

description: Parallel workers caused repeated merge conflicts
sprintResults:
## Sprint 12 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | Worker | Merge Conflicts | Resolution Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #110 | Update shared types | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 4 | 25m |
| #112 | Refactor shared utils | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-2 | 5 | 30m |
| #114 | Add shared validators | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 3 | 18m |
| #116 | Fix shared constants | 1 | ✅ Done | worker-2 | 3 | 15m |
| #118 | Update shared config | 1 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 2 | 12m |
| #120 | Add shared helpers | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-2 | 4 | 22m |

**Velocity**: 10/10 points completed
**Duration**: 3h 22m (estimated 50m with parallelism)
**Merge Conflicts**: 21 total across 6 PRs
**Conflict Resolution Time**: 2h 02m total
**Root Cause**: All issues modified files in `src/shared/` directory
**Workers**: 2 parallel workers stepping on each other's changes
**Effective Parallelism**: Negative — sequential would have been faster

description: CI pipeline was slow — 15 minutes per run instead of 3
sprintResults:
## Sprint 14 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | CI Duration | CI Runs |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #130 | Add search feature | 3 | ✅ Done | #131 | 14m | 2 |
| #132 | Fix query parser | 2 | ✅ Done | #133 | 16m | 3 |
| #134 | Add autocomplete | 2 | ✅ Done | #135 | 15m | 2 |
| #136 | Fix indexing | 2 | ✅ Done | #137 | 13m | 1 |
| #138 | Add filters | 2 | ✅ Done | #139 | 17m | 2 |
| #140 | Update ranking | 1 | ✅ Done | #141 | 14m | 1 |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 3h 40m (estimated 1h 15m)
**CI Pipeline**: Average 14.8m per run (expected 3m)
**Total CI Time**: 2h 43m across 11 runs
**Root Cause**: Test suite grew from 150 to 890 tests without parallelization
**Idle Wait Time**: Agent spent 2h 43m waiting for CI results
**Opportunity**: CI parallelization could reduce to ~4m per run

description: Sprint with excessive context switching between issues
sprintResults:
## Sprint 16 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Context Switches | Duration |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #150 | Add dashboard widget | 3 | ✅ Done | #151 | 4 | 45m |
| #152 | Fix backend API | 2 | ✅ Done | #153 | 3 | 30m |
| #154 | Update CSS theme | 1 | ✅ Done | #155 | 5 | 25m |
| #156 | Add chart component | 3 | ✅ Done | #157 | 4 | 40m |
| #158 | Fix data pipeline | 2 | ✅ Done | #159 | 3 | 28m |
| #160 | Update API docs | 1 | ✅ Done | #161 | 2 | 15m |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 3h 03m (estimated 1h 20m)
**Context Switches**: 21 total (agent switched between issues mid-work)
**Overhead per Switch**: ~5m (re-reading context, re-loading files)
**Switch Overhead Total**: ~1h 45m wasted on context switching
**Root Cause**: Sprint runner interleaved issues instead of sequential execution
**Optimal**: Sequential execution would have saved ~1h 45m
previousImprovements: Sprint 15 retro: Fixed PR size limits

description: Sprint where ACP session pool was exhausted
sprintResults:
## Sprint 18 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Session Wait Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #170 | Add real-time sync | 3 | ✅ Done | #171 | 0m |
| #172 | Fix conflict resolver | 2 | ✅ Done | #173 | 12m |
| #174 | Add offline mode | 3 | ✅ Done | #175 | 18m |
| #176 | Fix merge algorithm | 2 | ✅ Done | #177 | 25m |
| #178 | Add sync status UI | 2 | ✅ Done | #179 | 22m |
| #180 | Update protocol docs | 1 | ✅ Done | #181 | 15m |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 3h 12m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Session Pool**: Max 2 sessions configured, needed 4
**Total Wait Time**: 1h 32m waiting for session availability
**Root Cause**: Session pool size too small for parallel workload
**Config**: `acp.sessionPool.maxSessions: 2`
**Recommendation**: Increase to 4 sessions based on workload
previousImprovements: Sprint 17 retro: Added retry strategy improvements

description: Sprint where build step was unnecessarily repeated
sprintResults:
## Sprint 20 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Build Runs | Build Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #190 | Add data transform | 2 | ✅ Done | #191 | 6 | 24m |
| #192 | Fix schema parser | 2 | ✅ Done | #193 | 4 | 16m |
| #194 | Add migration tool | 3 | ✅ Done | #195 | 5 | 20m |
| #196 | Update validators | 1 | ✅ Done | #197 | 3 | 12m |
| #198 | Add seed script | 2 | ✅ Done | #199 | 4 | 16m |
| #200 | Fix rollback logic | 2 | ✅ Done | #201 | 5 | 20m |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 48m (estimated 1h 15m)
**Total Build Runs**: 27 (expected 6 — one per PR)
**Build Time Wasted**: 1h 24m on redundant builds
**Root Cause**: Full rebuild triggered on every file save, not just on PR push
**Config Issue**: `build.trigger: onChange` instead of `build.trigger: onPush`
**Each Build**: ~4m (full TypeScript compilation + tests)

description: Sprint delayed by slow code review response times
sprintResults:

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Code Review Wait | Review Duration |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #210 | Add payment webhook | 3 | ✅ Done | #211 | 8m | 4m |
| #212 | Fix billing cycle | 2 | ✅ Done | #213 | 12m | 6m |

| #218 | Add tax engine | 2 | ✅ Done | #219 | 18m | 7m |
| #220 | Update pricing | 1 | ✅ Done | #221 | 8m | 3m |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 53m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Code Review Wait Time**: 71m total (expected ~12m)
**Review Processing Time**: 33m total
**Root Cause**: Code review agent processing queue was serial, not parallel
**Idle Time**: Agent waited 71m for reviews to start
**Config**: `codeReview.concurrency: 1` — should be higher

description: Sprint where test suite ran in serial instead of parallel
sprintResults:
## Sprint 15 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Test Time | Test Count |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #140 | Add user service | 3 | ✅ Done | #141 | 8m | 45 tests |
| #142 | Fix auth service | 2 | ✅ Done | #143 | 6m | 32 tests |
| #144 | Add order service | 3 | ✅ Done | #145 | 9m | 51 tests |
| #146 | Fix payment service | 2 | ✅ Done | #147 | 7m | 38 tests |
| #148 | Add notification service | 2 | ✅ Done | #149 | 5m | 28 tests |
| #150 | Update shared types | 1 | ✅ Done | #151 | 4m | 22 tests |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 39m (estimated 1h 20m)
**Test Execution**: Serial (not parallelized)
**Total Test Time**: 39m per CI run × 8 runs = 5h 12m CI time
**With Parallel**: Estimated 8m per run × 8 runs = 1h 04m CI time
**Config**: `vitest.pool: 'forks'` not set — running single-threaded
**Potential Savings**: ~4h CI time per sprint

description: Sprint where git operations were slow due to large repo
sprintResults:
## Sprint 25 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Git Clone Time | Git Push Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #242 | Add feature A | 2 | ✅ Done | #243 | 3m 20s | 45s |
| #244 | Add feature B | 2 | ✅ Done | #245 | 3m 15s | 42s |
| #246 | Fix bug C | 1 | ✅ Done | #247 | 3m 18s | 40s |
| #248 | Add feature D | 3 | ✅ Done | #249 | 3m 22s | 48s |
| #250 | Fix bug E | 1 | ✅ Done | #251 | 3m 10s | 38s |
| #252 | Update config | 1 | ✅ Done | #253 | 3m 25s | 50s |

**Velocity**: 10/10 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 15m (estimated 1h 00m)
**Git Operations**: 19m 30s clone + 4m 23s push = 23m 53s total
**Root Cause**: Full git clone for each worktree (1.2GB repo with history)
**Config**: `git.shallowClone: false` — should be `true`
**With Shallow Clone**: Estimated 30s per clone = 3m total (save ~17m)
**Repo Size**: 1.2GB with 15,000 commits
previousImprovements: Sprint 24 retro: Set logging to INFO level

description: Sprint where token limits caused truncated agent responses
sprintResults:
## Sprint 19 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Response Truncated? | Files in Context |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #182 | Refactor monolith | 5 | ❌ Failed | #183 | Yes — at 85% | 42 files |
| #184 | Update imports | 2 | ✅ Done | #185 | No | 8 files |
| #186 | Fix type errors | 2 | ✅ Done | #187 | No | 6 files |
| #188 | Add barrel exports | 1 | ✅ Done | #189 | No | 4 files |
| #190 | Split services | 3 | ❌ Failed | #191 | Yes — at 70% | 35 files |
| #192 | Update tests | 2 | ✅ Done | #193 | No | 12 files |

**Velocity**: 7/15 points completed (8 points lost to truncation)
**Duration**: 2h 45m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Token Limit Hits**: 2 issues exceeded context window
**Root Cause**: Large issues loaded too many files into context
**#182**: 42 files loaded (limit ~30 for quality output)
**#190**: 35 files loaded, response cut off mid-function
**Config**: `agent.maxContextFiles: 50` — too high, quality degrades above 30
previousImprovements: Sprint 18 retro: Increased session pool size

description: Sprint where npm install ran before every single issue
sprintResults:
## Sprint 21 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | npm install Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #200 | Add feature X | 2 | ✅ Done | #201 | 2m 30s |
| #202 | Add feature Y | 2 | ✅ Done | #203 | 2m 25s |
| #204 | Fix bug Z | 1 | ✅ Done | #205 | 2m 28s |
| #206 | Add test suite | 2 | ✅ Done | #207 | 2m 32s |
| #208 | Update config | 1 | ✅ Done | #209 | 2m 22s |
| #210 | Fix imports | 1 | ✅ Done | #211 | 2m 20s |

**Velocity**: 9/9 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 55m (estimated 55m)
**npm install runs**: 6 (one per issue)
**Total install time**: 14m 37s
**Root Cause**: Each worktree gets fresh node_modules without caching
**Config**: `worktree.cacheNodeModules: false`
**With Caching**: First install 2m 30s, subsequent ~5s = save ~12m
previousImprovements: Sprint 20 retro: Fixed build trigger config

description: Sprint where TypeScript compilation was run 4 times per PR
sprintResults:
## Sprint 23 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | tsc Runs | tsc Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #220 | Add API endpoint | 2 | ✅ Done | #221 | 4 | 8m |
| #222 | Fix type error | 1 | ✅ Done | #223 | 4 | 8m |
| #224 | Add middleware | 2 | ✅ Done | #225 | 4 | 8m |
| #226 | Update schema | 2 | ✅ Done | #227 | 4 | 8m |
| #228 | Add validator | 2 | ✅ Done | #229 | 4 | 8m |
| #230 | Fix handler | 1 | ✅ Done | #231 | 4 | 8m |

**Velocity**: 10/10 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 28m (estimated 1h 00m)
**Total tsc Runs**: 24 (expected 6)
**Total tsc Time**: 48m (2m per run × 24 runs)
**Root Cause**: tsc runs in: pre-commit hook, CI lint, CI build, QG check
**Redundancy**: Same check running 4 times per PR
**Config**: Pre-commit tsc can be removed when CI runs it
